1.details: Set up the complete project structure with Next.js frontend and FastAPI backend. Configure Supabase database, authentication, and storage. Set up development environment and basic routing.

2.details: Implement multi-tier authentication (Super Admin, Admin, Client) with Supabase Auth. Create login page, user approval workflow, and role-based access control. Implement white-labeling features.

3.details: Build the main admin dashboard with financial widgets, client status grid, live admin counter, notifications hub, and internal chat system. Implement color-coded client status logic.

4.details: Create client onboarding workflow, detailed client dashboard, project management suite (tasks, goals, notes, communication log), and client filtering system.

5.details: Implement intelligent CSV data parser, Google API integrations (GA4, GSC, GBP), SEO analysis modules, competitor analysis, link analysis, and Google Trends integration.

6.details: Build the comprehensive 10-tab spreadsheet-like interface for client SEO strategy with real-time editing capabilities using AG-Grid or similar library.

7.details: Integrate Google Gemini API for data analysis, summarization, and predictive insights. Implement cost control mechanisms and prompt management system.

8.details: Create leads dashboard with Kanban board, proposal generator, backlink opportunities database, and financial tracking with advanced charts.

9.details: Build simplified, branded client portal with performance charts, progress tracking, and competitor insights. Implement custom domain support.

10.details: Implement prompt management CRUD interface, schema markup generator and validator, lead tracking system for local SEO clients, and automated data processing.

11.details: Comprehensive testing of all features, Vercel deployment setup, integration testing with Google APIs, and final system validation. Ensure the Gemini API key is properly integrated.
